message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a mutually beneficial deal. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I appreciate your willingness to make an offer, Bob, but I'm afraid I have to decline your offer of $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $13000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $12500. I'm willing to compromise a bit further, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $13500. What do you think?
